revisions.rev:
{{Infobox_Broadcast | call_letters = DXNL-TV (PTV-27 Cagayan De Oro)| station_logo = <!-- Do NOT place a non-free image here without complying with WP:NFCC #10c -->| station_slogan = People's Television| station_branding = ''PTV-27 Cagayan De Oro''| analog = 27 ([[UHF]])| digital = | affiliations = [[People's Television Network]]| founded = [[1990]]| location = [[Cagayan De Oro City]]| owner = [[People's Television Network|People's Television Network, Inc.]]| former_affiliations = [[GMA Network]] through Citynet Television (1995-2001)| former_callsigns = | effective_radiated_power = 1 kilowatt| homepage = [http://www.ptni.tv/ People's Television Network]| }} '''DXNL-TV''', channel 27, is a television station of [[Philippines|Philippine]] [[television network]] [[People's Television Network]]. Its offices, studios and transmitter facility are located at Kauswagan, Cagayan de Oro City, and at Executive Centrum building J. R. Borja street, Cagayan de Oro City.
